DOC.brief_summary: The goal study determine Visceral Manipulation ( VM ) effective treat Functional Dyspepsia addition drug therapy . Null hypothesis VM influence FD symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Does Visceral Manipulation Works Treating Functional Dyspepsia ?
DOC.detailed_description: 50 patient Functional Dyspepsia ( FD ) diagnose General Practitioners randomize two therapy group : 1 ) drug group 2 ) drug + Visceral Manipulation group . Group 1 receive drug therapy 4 week , Group 2 receive drug therapy 4 week 4 Visceral Manipulation visit weekly frequency ( visit 1 day 1 drug therapy ) . FD symptom record VAS baseline 1 4 week therapy , 8 week ( 4 week finish therapy ) .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Functional Dyspepsia Diabetes Mellitus Mental disturbance Thyroid gland dysfunction Intestinal , liver biliary tract disease Concurrent medication could interact GI function Positive Helicobacter Pylori status
